import React, { Component } from 'react' import {DataContext} from '../Context' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Colors from './Colors' import '../css/Details.css' import '../css/Cart.css' const Cart = () => { return (
{ (cart.length === 0)?

Aucun produit dans le panier

: cart.map(item =>(

{item.title}

{item.price * item.count}€

{item.description}

{item.content}

{item.count}
removeProduct(item._id)}>X
)) }
Paiement

Total:{total}€

) } export default Cart
